name: backup-everything-to-google-drive
description: Automated backup system for folders and PostgreSQL databases to Google Drive

scripts.pm2:start: node -e "const config=require('./.config');const schedule=config.schedule||'0 2 * * *';require('child_process').execSync('pm2 start src/backup.js --name backup-gdrive --cron-restart \"'+schedule+'\"',{stdio:'inherit'})"
